glosses: To forbid from, to prohibit, to disallow.

examples.text: Mahkeme zanlıyı ülke dışına çıkmaktan menetti.
examples.translation: The court forbade the suspect from leaving the country.

examples.text: Mahkeme zanlıya ülke dışına çıkmayı menetti.
examples.translation: The court forbade the suspect from leaving the country.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish منع ایتمك (menʿ itmek, etmek, “to prevent, to forbid”), equivalent to compound of men (“an act of forbidding, preventing”) + etmek (“to do, to make”).
